title: Senior Email Developer
content:
We are looking for a Senior Front-End developer to implement dynamic email templates for highly visible clients. The role is heavily production focused with high output and tight deadlines while ensuring an unwavering commitment to quality. You will be working with a large multidisciplinary team that include other developers, project managers, designers, email operations managers, and QA. This role is based in Buenos Aires.
In this role you’ll:

Provide time estimations for new projects and features that you’ll be working on.
Create complex and dynamic email templates that are mobile responsive, performant, and accessible.
Maintain existing scripts, codebases, and campaign architecture documentation.
Support the email operations team with building custom queries, email templates, FreeMarker-based dynamic templates, automation jobs, and providing guidance on comprehensive customer journeys.
Execute and manage a variety of email campaign projects with the highest quality standards, while hitting every deadline. You will gather business requirements, develop, test, report, troubleshoot, and optimize email campaigns
Collaborate with a multidisciplinary team that include project managers, email operations managers, QA, and creative designers. 
Research and implement new frontend technologies and standards that improve our process.
Ensure spam regulation compliance (CAN-SPAM)

Requirements:

At least 3 years of experience with HTML, CSS, and responsive email template coding (experience on web design is a plus but at least 3 years of experience working with email marketing)
Strong working knowledge of creative suites such as Figma, Adobe Photoshop, etc.
Ability to create pixel-perfect code of creative design.
Experience using Litmus or other rendering checking systems.
Experience working in teams with Project Management Software. (Jira, Monday, etc)
Experience with SQL and data segmentation principles.
Familiarity with scripting languages like FreeMarker and/or Handlebars (Salesforce AmpScript, Responsys RPL, etc. are nice to have)
Basic understanding of React.
Ensuring emails are accessible across many platforms, including web, smartphones, various apps, etc.
Ability to create maintainable and reusable code.
Ability to test and debug emails.
Understanding of email marketing and marketing automation technology.
Basic knowledge of email compliance regulations.
Prior experience with email service platforms (Responsys, Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Braze, Sendgrid, etc).  Expert knowledge is nice to have.
Proficient english. This will be evaluated during the selection process.

 About Media.Monks:
Media.Monks is the purely digital operating brand of S4Capital plc that connects 8,600+ digital natives across one global team. We are united by a mission to shift industries forward and pave the path towards ambitious outcomes so our clients and our people can realize their full potential for growth. Our unified model combines solutions in media, data, social, platforms, studio, experience, brand and technology services to help our clients continuously reinvent themselves throughout increasingly rapid cycles of disruption. Our efforts to shape culture, build innovative technologies and unlock the future of growth have earned recognition from numerous esteemed panels: we maintain a constant presence on Adweek’s Fastest Growing lists (2019-22), regular recognition at Cannes Lions, inclusion in AdExchanger’s Programmatic Power Players (2020-23), the title of Webby Production Company of the Year (2021-23), a record number of FWAs, and have earned a spot on Newsweek’s Top 100 Global Most Loved Workplaces 2023. Together, these achievements solidify our experience in digital innovation, excellence in craft, and commitment to personal growth.
While we continue to grow our teams, please be mindful of fraudulent job postings and recruiting activities that may use our company name and information. Please be mindful to protect your personal information, especially your national identification number, and bank account information during a recruiting process. While Media.Monks may reach out to potential candidates via LinkedIn, we will always ask applicants to apply through our website (https://media.monks.com/careers) and will never ask for payment or bank account information during the recruitment process.
